question: Trump conviction declared a mistrial?
description:
On June 7 it was reported a person posted the comment “My cousin is a juror and says Trump is getting convicted” a day before the conviction, leading to speculation the conviction could be declared a mistrial (see https://x.com/LeadingReport/status/1799190574353756499).

This market will resolve to “Yes” if the Trump hush money case is declared a mistrial before sentencing. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”.

If no sentence is rendered by November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No."

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Trump conviction declared a mistrial?
events.description:

This market will resolve to “Yes” if the Trump hush money case is declared a mistrial before sentencing. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”.

If no sentence is rendered by November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No."

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: U.S. military action against Iran by August 31?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the United States initiates a military action on Iranian soil, airspace, or maritime territory between July 30 and August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a "military action" will be considered to be any use of force executed by the U.S. on Iranian soil, airspace, or maritime territory (e.g. if a weapons depot on Iranian soil is hit by an U.S. missile, this market will resolve to "Yes") that is officially acknowledged by the U.S. government or a consensus of credible reporting. This includes, but is not limited to, airstrikes, naval attacks, or ground invasions. Cyber attacks, sanctions, or diplomatic actions will not count towards the resolution of this market.

In the case that the "Yes" resolution criteria are met prior to this market's resolution date, this market will resolve immediately.

This includes, but is not limited to, airstrikes, naval attacks, or ground invasions. Cyber attacks, sanctions, or diplomatic actions will not count towards the resolution of this market.

In the case that the "Yes" resolution criteria are met prior to this market's resolution date, this market will resolve immediately.

question: Will Kamala Harris say "Crypto" or "Bitcoin" during DNC speech?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Kamala Harris says "crypto" or "Bitcoin" during her DNC keynote speech. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

If Kamala Harris does not give a keynote speech at the DNC this market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the word  regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "crypto" or "Bitcoin" is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to decentralized cryptocurrency (e.g. "cryptocurrency-related" counts).

The resolution source will be the video of the speech.

events.title: What will Kamala say during DNC acceptance speech?
events.description: This is a market group on what words Kamala Harris will say during her acceptance speech for her nomination as Democratic candidate for President of the United States.

question: Will Nodirbek Abdusattorov win the 2024 Sinquefield Cup?
description:
The 2024 Sinquefield Cup is scheduled to take place August 19 - 29 in Missouri, USA. You can read more about it here: https://grandchesstour.org/tours/2024/tournaments/2024-sinquefield-cup/

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Nodirbek Abdusattorov wins the 2024 Sinquefield Cup. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If it can be definitively determined at any point that this player will not be the winner of this competition based on the rules of the tournament, this market may immediately resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be the official information from the the 2024 Sinquefield Cup including footage from the tournament (which will be streamed here: https://www.youtube.com/user/STLChessClub), however a consensus of other credible sources may be used.

events.title: Sinquefield Cup 2024 Winner

description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Beyoncé performs at the 2024 Democratic National Convention by the conclusion of the convention. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

The resolution source will be video of the convention.

question: Bengals vs. Colts
description:
In the upcoming NFL game, scheduled for August 22 at 8:00 PM ET:

If the Cincinnati Bengals win, the market will resolve to “Bengals”.

If the Indianapolis Colts win, the market will resolve to “Colts”.

 If the game is not completed by August 29, 2024 (11:59 PM ET) or it ends in a tie, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Trump go on Joe Rogan before election?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump is a guest on any "The Joe Rogan Experience" podcast episode between August 20 and November 4, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be Spotify, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will Kamala Harris say "Inflation" during DNC speech?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Kamala Harris says "inflation" during her DNC keynote speech. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

If Kamala Harris does not give a keynote speech at the DNC this market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the word regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "inflation" is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to increases in costs of goods and services.

The resolution source will be the video of the speech.

events.title: What will Kamala say during DNC acceptance speech?
events.description: This is a market group on what words Kamala Harris will say during her acceptance speech for her nomination as Democratic candidate for President of the United States.

question: Tim Walz DNC Speech: O/U 30 minutes?
description:
This market will resolve to "Over" if Tim Walz's main speech, currently scheduled for the third night of the Democratic National Convention (DNC), exceeds 30 minutes in length. If the speech is 30 minutes or less, the market will resolve to "Under."

The speech length will be measured from the start of when Walz begins audibly speaking on stage during his speech until he finishes his speech.

If Walz does not give a speech at the DNC, this market will resolve to "Under".

This market may resolve once Walz has given a speech on the main stage of the DNC.

The resolution source will be the live video of the event.

events.title: Tim Walz DNC Speech: O/U 30 minutes?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Over" if Tim Walz's main speech, currently scheduled for the third night of the Democratic National Convention (DNC), exceeds 30 minutes in length. If the speech is 30 minutes or less, the market will resolve to "Under."

The speech length will be measured from the start of when Walz begins audibly speaking on stage during his speech until he finishes his speech.

If Walz does not give a speech at the DNC, this market will resolve to "Under".

This market may resolve once Walz has given a speech on the main stage of the DNC.

The resolution source will be the live video of the event.

question: Speed/Kai beat Minecraft on 42nd attempt?
description:
IShowSpeed and Kai Cenat are presently at 41 deaths in their hardcore Minecraft challenge.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if IShowSpeed and Kai Cenat beat their hardcore Minecraft challenge during the present (42nd) attempt, without both dying. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market will only resolve to "No" if both die - if one dies and the other beats it, this market will resolve to "Yes."

The primary resolution source for this market will be official video from IShowSpeed (https://www.youtube.com/@IShowSpeed) and Kai Cenat (https://www.twitch.tv/kaicenat), however a consensus of credible sources will also be used.

question: Another Trump x Musk space before October?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump and Elon Musk hold another space on X together between August 21 and September 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For this market to resolve to "Yes" it is necessary that an X space between the candidates actually occur. Announcements that such a space will occur will not be sufficient.

The primary resolution source for this market is information from Donald Trump and Elon Musk and their official representatives, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Another Trump x Musk space before October?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump and Elon Musk hold another space on X together between August 21 and September 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For this market to resolve to "Yes" it is necessary that an X space between the candidates actually occur. Announcements that such a space will occur will not be sufficient.

The primary resolution source for this market is information from Donald Trump and Elon Musk and their official representatives, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will Donald Trump say "Comrade Kamala" in border speech?
description:
Donald Trump is scheduled to speak at the US Southern border on August 22, 2024.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump says "Comrade Kamala" during his appearance at this event. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the phrase regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the phrase will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

If Trump does not give a speech at this event, or if the event is otherwise cancelled or delayed beyond August 22, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be the video of the speech.

events.title: What will Trump say during border speech?
events.description: This is a market group over what Donald Trump will say at his border speech scheduled for August 22, 2024.

question: Will Kamala lead by 0-0.9 August 30?
description:
This is a market on the RCP Polling Average margin between Donald Trump and Kamala Harris as of August 30, 2024, 12:00 PM ET. The spread referenced in the first table on the "2024 General Election: Trump vs. Harris" page at https://www.realclearpolling.com/polls/president/general/2024/trump-vs-harris will be used to resolve this market.

This market will resolve to 'Yes' if the RCP Polling Average margin is between Harris +0.0 (inclusive) and Harris +0.9 (inclusive) percentage points. Otherwise, this market will resolve to 'No'.

The RCP Polling Average will be checked on August 30, 12:00 PM ET.

Please note, this market refers specifically to the margin for RCP polling average as presented in the aforementioned chart in the column titled 'Spread'. This includes any adjustments or methodology changes made by RCP in their calculation of the polling average or the date range used.

If the RCP Polling Average margin data between Kamala Harris and Donald Trump is not available by September 3, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, another credible source of polling data as of August 30, 12:00 PM ET will be used for market resolution.

events.title: Trump vs. Harris RCP polling margin on Aug 30?
events.description: Trump vs. Harris RCP polling margin on Aug 30?

question: Will Kamala lead by 1-1.4 August 30?
description:
This is a market on the RCP Polling Average margin between Donald Trump and Kamala Harris as of August 30, 2024, 12:00 PM ET. The spread referenced in the first table on the "2024 General Election: Trump vs. Harris" page at https://www.realclearpolling.com/polls/president/general/2024/trump-vs-harris will be used to resolve this market.

This market will resolve to 'Yes' if the RCP Polling Average margin is between Harris +1.0 (inclusive) and Harris +1.4 (inclusive) percentage points. Otherwise, this market will resolve to 'No'.

The RCP Polling Average will be checked on August 30, 12:00 PM ET.

Please note, this market refers specifically to the margin for RCP polling average as presented in the aforementioned chart in the column titled 'Spread'. This includes any adjustments or methodology changes made by RCP in their calculation of the polling average or the date range used.

If the RCP Polling Average margin data between Kamala Harris and Donald Trump is not available by September 3, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, another credible source of polling data as of August 30, 12:00 PM ET will be used for market resolution.

events.title: Trump vs. Harris RCP polling margin on Aug 30?
events.description: Trump vs. Harris RCP polling margin on Aug 30?

question: Will Trump post "Beautiful" on final night of DNC?
description:
On August 22, Donald Trump posted on Truth Social that he would doing “a LIVE PLAY BY PLAY on TRUTH Social of Comrade Kamala Harris’ Speech tonight” (see: https://truthsocial.com/@realDonaldTrump/113006326768388905). 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if @realDonaldTrump posts the word “beautiful" on Truth Social, Between August 22, 10:00 PM ET and August 23 2:00 AM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, all quote and reply posts count toward a "Yes" resolution, but reposts will not count.

Pluralizations/possessives of the word as well as variance in letter capitalizations will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Misspellings of the word will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "beautiful" is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to something which is pleasing to the senses or aesthetically delightful. 

The resolution source for this market will be Donald Trump's verified Truth Social account: @realDonaldTrump

Note: The word will count even if it is preceded by a hashtag and appears without a space (e.g., "#TaxDay2024" would count for "tax").

events.title: What will Trump say on Truth Social during DNC final night?
events.description: This is a market on predicting what Donald Trump will post on social media during the final night of the Democratic National Convention.

For the purposes of this market, all quote and reply posts  count toward a "Yes" resolution, but reposts will not count.

Pluralizations/possessives of the word as well as variance in letter capitalizations will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Misspellings of the word will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "crazy" is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to behavior which extremely irrational, unpredictable, or mentally unstable.

The resolution source for this market will be Donald Trump's verified Truth Social account: @realDonaldTrump

Note: The word will count even if it is preceded by a hashtag and appears without a space (e.g., "#TaxDay2024" would count for "tax").

question: Will Trump post "Border" 3 or more times on final night of DNC?
description:
On August 22, Donald Trump posted on Truth Social that he would doing “a LIVE PLAY BY PLAY on TRUTH Social of Comrade Kamala Harris’ Speech tonight” (see: https://truthsocial.com/@realDonaldTrump/113006326768388905). 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if @realDonaldTrump posts the word “Border" 3 or more times on Truth Social, Between August 22, 10:00 PM ET and August 23 2:00 AM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, all quote and reply posts count toward a "Yes" resolution, but reposts will not count.

Pluralizations/possessives of the word as well as variance in letter capitalizations will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Misspellings of the word will NOT count.

Each usage of the word will count as a mention, even if used multiple times in a single post.

Compound words will count as long as "Border" is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to the dividing line or edge between two areas.

The resolution source for this market will be Donald Trump's verified Truth Social account: @realDonaldTrump

Note: The word will count even if it is preceded by a hashtag and appears without a space (e.g., "#TaxDay2024" would count for "tax").

question: Will Speed stream with Ronaldo before October?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if YouTuber "IShowSpeed" (Darren Watkins Jr.) publicly participates in a live stream with soccer player Cristiano Ronaldo on any platform between August 21, and  September 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

The stream must be accessible to the public, and Ronaldo must be be visibly present in the stream - video calls in which Ronaldo is seen by viewers will qualify, however audio phone calls will not count.

The resolution source will be video of the stream.

question: Will Kamala lead by 1.5-1.9 August 30?
description:
This is a market on the RCP Polling Average margin between Donald Trump and Kamala Harris as of August 30, 2024, 12:00 PM ET. The spread referenced in the first table on the "2024 General Election: Trump vs. Harris" page at https://www.realclearpolling.com/polls/president/general/2024/trump-vs-harris will be used to resolve this market.

This market will resolve to 'Yes' if the RCP Polling Average margin is between Harris +1.5 (inclusive) and Harris +1.9 (inclusive) percentage points. Otherwise, this market will resolve to 'No'.

The RCP Polling Average will be checked on August 30, 12:00 PM ET.

Please note, this market refers specifically to the margin for RCP polling average as presented in the aforementioned chart in the column titled 'Spread'. This includes any adjustments or methodology changes made by RCP in their calculation of the polling average or the date range used.

If the RCP Polling Average margin data between Kamala Harris and Donald Trump is not available by September 3, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, another credible source of polling data as of August 30, 12:00 PM ET will be used for market resolution.

events.title: Trump vs. Harris RCP polling margin on Aug 30?
events.description: Trump vs. Harris RCP polling margin on Aug 30?

question: Will Ex-Amazon VP reveal who seduced his wife?
description:
On August 22, Ethan Evans posted on LinkedIn and X that "A CEO that I worked for seduced my wife" (see: https://www.linkedin.com/posts/ethanevansvp_a-ceo-that-i-worked-for-seduced-my-wife-in-activity-7232403648390029312-WWZd?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if former Amazon VP Ethan Evans publicly names the CEO who seduced his wife by August 25, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The individual will be considered named if Ethan Evans publicly states their first and last name, states either their first or last name along with accompanying details which confirm the individuals identity, or otherwise definitively confirms the identity of the individual (e.g. if someone asks whether it was a specific individual and Ethan confirms, it will count).

The resolution source for this market will be public statements from Ethan Evans.

question: Will Kamala's DNC speech have less than 23m viewers?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the final night of the 2024 Democratic National Convention (DNC) has fewer than 23,000,000 viewers according to Nielsen. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be information from Nielsen, specifically their Persons 2+ statistic. If Nielsen does not provide viewership information for the DNC by September 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, another credible source may be chosen.

events.title: How many viewers will Kamala's DNC speech get?
events.description: This is a market over how many viewers will tune in for the 4th night of the Democratic National Convention, scheduled for Thursday, August 22, 2024.

question: Will George Bush speak at the DNC?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if former US President George W. Bush is a speaker at the Democratic National Convention. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This person will be considered a "speaker" if they publicly speak in-person at the convention to an audience.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the Democratic party, including footage from the convention, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.
